resources.string: The app will ask permission to show the list of accounts in the device, so you can choose which one to use. You can revoke the permission from android settings after selecting one if you want. If you deny the operation will be canceled.
This app requires Google Play Services. Please install Google Play Services on your device and relaunch this app.
Congratulations! Now you know how to use this.
An internal error occurred, try again in a few minutes.
Wait…did you just…blacklisted The awesome old youtube logo? :(

This app uses Youtube API3 to insert videos into your \'watch later\' personal playlist. The app needs to access your youtube account for this purpose, but no other data is retrieved nor used. The \'GET_ACCOUNTS\' permissions is needed only to show the list of accounts in the device, you can revoke it from android settings after selecting one if you want.

This is an example video to test the app (don\'t worry, the video is just an oficial old video of the youtube logo). Double click, or long tap, the textbox to select it, click on share, and click on this app from the list. If your device doesn\'t show the \'share\' option you can click the button to simulate it.
If this option is checked, videos will be selected by default so simply clicking \'save\' on the dialog will save them all (you can unselect them manually anyway).

If this toggle is enabled this app will be eligible when clicking youtube links. Then you can either choose to save the video or open it directly on Youtube. (A dialog to choose will always be shown, even if this app is set as the default one).
Open youtube links on this app:

If after parsing the url the number of videos found is less or equal to the following setting, they will be automatically added instead of asking what to do. Less data will be used, and the process will be faster.
Click this button to unselect the selected account (if any).\nWhen using the app if no account is selected it will ask to choose.
Black List: Any link found here will be removed when scanning a page.
Write here urls to unwanted videos
